rows.label: qev060802_MSG0049
rows.name:
My friend Nococche is repairing my backpack at the
moment. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0050
rows.name:
She's been mumbling for a while, though. *fsssh*
Do you suppose she will be able to handle it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0051
rows.name:
So you volunteered to find the part needed to repair
my backpack? *fsssh* I really appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0052
rows.name:
Between you and Nococche, it seems like everyone in
this city is so friendly and helpful! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0001
rows.name:
*fsssh* Nococche won't get up! What...
What could have happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_JNK0010
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev060802_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask if it's possible that she inhaled voltant.

rows.label: qev060802_JNK0020
rows.name: Soothe

rows.label: qev060802_SEL0021
rows.name: Try to help Atheron calm down.

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0002
rows.name:
You're right! *fsssh* She said it was leaking from the
backpack, didn't she?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0003
rows.name:
She's been poring over it this whole time with barely
any breaks—she must have been exposed! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0004
rows.name: Sorry. You're right. There must be some cause. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0005
rows.name: Er, you don't suppose...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0006
rows.name:
*fsssh* Could she have inhaled some voltant that leaked
from my backpack?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0007
rows.name:
That has to be it. *fsssh* She's been here poring over it
this whole time, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm sorry to ask more of you, but is there any way you
could go to Cauldros to look for a couple of mottled
mums and some ore called parhelion platinum? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0009
rows.name:
I can make a devoltanizing extract from them that
should be able to save Nococche. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0010
rows.name: Please. She was the first friend I made here in the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0011
rows.name:
*fsssh* If I killed her—and with sacred voltant no less—
I just couldn't bear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0012
rows.name:
Nococche was so eager to fix my backpack for me,
and I wound up poisoning her. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0013
rows.name:
But if you can bring me two mottled mums and, say,
five pieces of parhelion platinum, I think I can save her.
*fsssh* ...No. I promise I will![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0014
rows.name:
*fsssh* Have you found the mottled mums and
parhelion platinum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0015
rows.name:
The color's draining from her face... *fsssh*
She's weakening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0016
rows.name:
Yes, that's exactly what I needed! *fsssh*
I'll just absorb those into me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0017
rows.name: *fsssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0018
rows.name:
Uurgh...aaAAAH! *fsssh*
I can...feel the voltant surging...inside me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0019
rows.name:
I won't let my...friend die... *fsssh* *fsssh* *fsssh*
Hrrrrrngh! ...There. If I give this to Nococche,
she should improve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0020
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0021
rows.name: ...Nnngh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0022
rows.name: ...Mmm? Was I sleeping?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev060802_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Atheron what in the world he just did.

rows.label: qev060802_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev060802_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Nococche how she feels.

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0023
rows.name:
We produce an extract when we devoltanize. *fsssh*
I used some to neutralize the voltant inside her body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0024
rows.name:
It takes a very precise mixture, and this is the first time
I've heard of anyone trying it on a non-Zaruboggan.
I'm relieved it worked! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0025
rows.name:
More refreshed and awake than I have been in a long
while, after that nap. Er, should I feel differently?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0026
rows.name:
That means the voltant was removed successfully.
I'm so glad! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0027
rows.name:
I feel like I'm missing something here, but I guess
it sounds like everything worked out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0028
rows.name:
How is that backpack working, Atheron?
No problems?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0029
rows.name:
It's perfect, thank you. *fsssh*
And you're sure your body feels all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0030
rows.name:
Better than ever. Probably thanks to that big nap
I took, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0031
rows.name:
*fsssh* I guess we both owe [ST:playername ]
for all [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0032
rows.name: Oh? Oh! Yes, of course. You have my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0033
rows.name:
Here is a little something to show our gratitude,
if that's all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0034
rows.name:
And I've learned my lesson. *fsssh* From here on out,
I'll be extra thorough about maintaining my backpack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0035
rows.name:
It could turn into a major tragedy if it started leaking
voltant in the middle of New LA. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_JNK0050
rows.name: Worry about NLA

rows.label: qev060802_SEL0051
rows.name: Fret about whether the city is at risk.

rows.label: qev060802_JNK0060
rows.name: Worry about Atheron

rows.label: qev060802_SEL0061
rows.name: Express concern for the burden placed on Atheron.

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0036
rows.name:
Your propensity to always think of the whole is very...
Well, it is very Zaruboggan, really. *fsssh*
I think you would get along well with my companions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0037
rows.name:
*fsssh* But if a large-scale incident WERE to occur,
we would surely be kicked out of New LA, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0038
rows.name:
Since coming here, we've become friends with you
humans and these amazing Ma-non. *fsssh*
I simply couldn't bear to leave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0039
rows.name:
No cause for worry. By this point, I probably have the
entire construction of your backpack memorized?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0040
rows.name:
Burn it, break it, crush it to dust—it doesn't matter.
I can put it back together in no time, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0041
rows.name:
You will have a home here for as long as you like,
all right? So so so don't worry about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0042
rows.name: Thank you, Nococche. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0043
rows.name:
I feel a new sort of connection with you. *fsssh*
One unlike the bond I share with other Zaruboggan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0044
rows.name:
*fsssh* You're like Nococche.
Always worrying more about me than yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0045
rows.name:
Still, thank you. But there is no need to worry. *fsssh*
We take pride in these bodies we've been granted by
Golbogga.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0046
rows.name:
They will hold, and we never consider our mission a
burden. If anything, I'm eager to go out there and
devoltanize more! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0047
rows.name:
Hmm. That is a largely foreign sentiment to me,
but if you can go about your work happy and healthy,
I suppose that's all that matters, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060802_MSG0048
rows.name:
And then we come home to this city and all the
wonderful friends we've made here. *fsssh*
Yes, us Zaruboggan will be just fine.[ST:wait ]
